name: AstroMaze!
description:
This is my 2D Shooter with modifications.

Modifications:

- Design Modifications: On Level 3, there are 15 enemies scattered throughout the asteroid maze. The Player must find and defeat them all in order to win.

- Aesthetic: Reskinned the enemies to look like spaceships with blinking light animations.

- Gameplay Modifications: After Level 1, the Player has an option to pick one of two power-ups to gain in Level 2. One power-up increases the Player's fire rate, the other increases the Player's speed. In Level 3, the Player gains the other power-up that they did not pick.

Credits:

Created by Zoie Tsoi
